objects.text:
• Handcrafted Bohemian Design
• Premium Leather Construction
• Comfortable Padded Insole
• Durable Artisanal Outsole

product_details.name: Artisan Comfort: Boho-Chic Designer Sneaker with Handcrafted Details
product_details.description:
• Unique bohemian-inspired design with decorative scalloped patterns
• Premium beige and tan leather construction with artisanal stitching
• Comfortable padded insole with light blue interior lining
• Durable rubber outsole with distinctive bubble texture
• Stylish brown contrast laces for adjustable fit
• Hand-detailed ornamental elements on toe and heel
• Lightweight and flexible construction for all-day wear
• Perfect blend of casual comfort and artistic expression
• Available in unique earth-tone color combination
• Ideal for fashion-forward individuals seeking distinctive footwear

banner_details:
This banner is designed for a product promotion, featuring a stylish boho-chic sneaker. The layout is divided into four quadrants with warm, earthy tones and geometric divisions. The left half focuses on textual content, while the right showcases the product image. The top-left corner features bold, uppercase heading text (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) in a deep brown color. Below it, there's a tagline (`tagline`) in a smaller, modern font. Mid-left features a bullet-point list (`description`) highlighting the product’s features in white. At the bottom-left, the price (`price`) is prominently displayed, accompanied by a rectangular button (`cta_button`) with a call to action (`cta`). The right side is dominated by the shoe (`product_image`), placed centrally for maximum focus.

**Color Palette**:
- Soft Beige: `#F7F3EA`
- Warm Tan: `#E0C9A6`
- Sandy Brown: `#D3A97C`
- Caramel Orange: `#C17F41`
- Soft Peach: `#E7BE90`
- Deep Brown: `#6B4226`
- Accent Orange: `#A05C17`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a creatively designed sneaker with a warm, earthy tonal palette. Dominant hues include soft beige (#F5D7A5), burnt orange (#C65A28), caramel brown (#A05B2A), and creamy off-white (#F9EFE1), blending together with a sculpted, artisan-crafted appeal. The upper uses beige and cream tones to highlight the shoe’s curves, while the vibrant burnt orange laces and textured sole add contrast and vibrancy. Subtle gradients and outlines emphasize the design portions, giving them depth. These blended warm tones evoke warmth and nostalgia, making them perfect for an advertisement banner aiming for artisanal elegance and playful uniqueness.
